ai-patthana8.56:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.56:0.3_0: And he decorated the skin of his head.
ai-patthana8.56:1.1_0: Being devoted to corruptions, the corruptions of the teaching corrupted by corruptions, the necklace, and the teaching don’t arise for cause.
ai-patthana8.56:1.1_1: Being committed to the practice of corrupt wishes, not to be corrupted.
ai-patthana8.56:1.1_2: Still, Being committed to the practice of corrupt wishes, hinting, or corrupted by corruptions, nor obliterates. Still, and not corruption for the sake of corruptions.
ai-patthana8.56:2.1_0: Being committed to the practice of corrupt wishes, not to be corrupted.
ai-patthana8.56:3.1_0: There is no corruptions for one whose corruptions are corrupted, nor corrupted, but not the teaching. For the sake of having corrupted the teaching gives rise to sorrow. There is no cause or condition for the corruption of corruptions.
ai-patthana8.56:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
